metadata.title: An Observation of Spurious Salinity Data

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description:
Data from two conductivity/temperature/depth (CTD) casts at the same site are presented. The first cast had two distinct excursions in
salinity, and spuriously low salinity throughout the cast, while the second had valid data. We suspect that the spurious salinity resulted from
transient biological fouling of the conductivity cell.
